alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 12 at 8:24PM EST until January 12 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 22 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA JACKSON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS COLQUITT THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR DOUGHERTY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBANY, ALFORDS, ASHBURN, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CHULA, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTON, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, EAST ALBANY, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HARDING, HAWKINSTOWN, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, LITTLE HOPE, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NEWTON, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, PRETORIA, QUITMAN, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TURNER CITY, WALKER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, AND WORTH.
